Overview

Visits:

2

If home purchased as a primary residence, townhome qualifies for a 4.99% interest rate 30 year fixed. Nestled in a tranquil setting in Garland, TX, this remodeled property offers a unique retreat that backs into a creek. Townhome comes 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Kitchen is remodeled with new cabinets, sink, countertops, and new faucet. Bathrooms both have new vanities with new faucets. This one won't last!
